data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 1, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 3, In Yokohama, Yasuki Kimoto (Cerezo) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Erik (Yokohama Marinos) gets in a strike â€“ but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 5, Yoshiro Imamura signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Cerezo's area.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 9, Yoshiro Imamura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos drive forward through Junior Santos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 11, Junior Santos (Yokohama Marinos) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Kota Watanabe (Yokohama Marinos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 16, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Erik gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Nissan Stadium.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 22, Yoshiro Imamura awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Yokohama Marinos apply pressure at Nissan Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Erik but the strike hits the bar!
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Throw-in Cerezo.
In the minute 27, Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Yokohama Marinos push forward at Nissan Stadium and Erik gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cerezo defence.
Marcos Junior gets his shot on target but fails to score for Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 30, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Cerezo throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
Yoshiro Imamura awards the home team a throw-in.
Marcos Junior of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 34, Important block from the Cerezo defence as Erik fires in a strike for Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Kota Watanabe's finish is wide of the goal.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Yokohama Marinos's Theerathon Bunmathan misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Yokohama Marinos drive upfield and Marcos Junior gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cerezo defender.
In the minute 41, Yokohama Marinos's Kota Watanabe breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Yokohama.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Yokohama.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick Cerezo.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 48, Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Cerezo have an attacking throw-in.
Hiroshi Kiyotake for Cerezo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Goal! Yokohama Marinos take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Erik.
Great play from Marcos Junior to set up the goal.
Yokohama Marinos attack but Junior Santos's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 54, Yoshiro Imamura awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Cerezo are pushing forward but Ayumu Seko's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo just outside Yokohama Marinos's area.
In the minute 56, Theerathon Bunmathan (Yokohama Marinos) has received a yellow card from Yoshiro Imamura.
Ken Tokura (Cerezo) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Yokohama Marinos defenders.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Hiroshi Kiyotake.
In the minute 61, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Kota Watanabe (Yokohama Marinos) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 63, Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In the minute 65, He's off! Makito Ito is shown a red card.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
The away team have replaced Yasuki Kimoto with Toshiyuki Takagi. This is the first substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
In the minute 67, Cerezo's Hiroshi Kiyotake gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Yokohama Marinos make their first substitution with Takahiro Ogihara replacing Kota Watanabe.
In the minute 71, Takuya Kida is on a sub for Takuya Wada for Yokohama Marinos.
Ange Postecoglou is making the team's third substitution at Nissan Stadium with Teruhito Nakagawa replacing Erik.
Miguel Angel Lotina (Cerezo) is making a second substitution, with Koji Suzuki replacing Ken Tokura.
In the minute 77, Cerezo drive upfield and Toshiyuki Takagi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Yokohama Marinos defender.
In Yokohama Cerezo attack through Hiroshi Kiyotake. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 77, Daizen Maeda is replacing Junior Santos for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 81, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos are whistled for offside.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Yusuke Maruhashi is replacing Hiroshi Kiyotake for the away team.
Daizen Maeda of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Marcos Junior with Kota Mizunuma.
Goal! Toshiyuki Takagi gives Cerezo a 1-2 lead in Yokohama.
In Yokohama Cerezo attack through Toshiyuki Takagi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 89, It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Yokohama.
Yokohama Marinos's Daizen Maeda gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Nissan Stadium.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Riku Matsuda for Cerezo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Yoshiro Imamura blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
